question: Which of the following married Mehrunnisa the widow of Sher Afghani?
explanation: Jahangir married Mehrunnisa, who was the widow of Sher Afghani in 1611 A.D. Jahangir gave Mehrunnisa the title of Nur Jahan which means the light of the World and her father Gyas Beg was given title of Itmaduddaulah.
